creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
A new JMeter's toolbar with different sizes (22x22, 32x32 and 48x48).

http://www.milamberspace.net/toolbar-several-sizes/

The main idea behind the different sizes is to have a better look with the high resolution screens (like 3200x1800 QHD+) 


The size can be change via a new property jmeter.toolbar.icons.size

Some icons have been created (toogle, start, remote start, remote stop&shutdown) from Open Icon Library svg files and some personal work. The svg source files will be include in xdocs/images/toolbar-custom/

creator: milamber@apache.org
